blogPost.excerpt: A free tool to help you find startup investors & manage your fundraising process. We help you to find the right person at the right firm. 🔍 Search 1000s of investors 💾 Save them to your FundBoard 🤝 Share them to get find introductions
blogPost.body: A free tool to help you find startup investors & manage your fundraising process. We help you to find the right person at the right firm. 🔍 Search 1000s of investors 💾 Save them to your FundBoard 🤝 Share them to get find introductions
blogPost.title: FundBoard - Build a tailor-fit list of startup investors in minutes
blogPost.author: DeAndrea Salvador

localize.description: 一个免费的工具，帮助你找到创业投资者和管理你的筹资过程。我们帮助您在合适的公司找到合适的人。🔍 搜索1000个投资人 💾 将他们保存到您的FundBoard 🤝 分享他们以获得寻找介绍的机会
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内建立一个量身定做的创业投资人名单。

localize.description: 一個免費的工具，幫助你找到創業投資者和管理你的籌資過程。我們幫助您在合適的公司找到合適的人。🔍 搜索1000個投資人 💾 將他們保存到您的FundBoard 🤝 分享他們以獲得尋找介紹的機會
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內建立一個量身定做的創業投資人名單。

previous.excerpt: Repl.it Teams for Education is a real-time collaborative coding environment for teachers and students to write code in 50+ languages. Teachers can create curriculum, facilitate pair-coding groups, provide instant code feedback with annotations and autograding.
previous.title: Repl.it Teams for Education - Zero-setup collaborative cloud IDE for teachers and students

localize.description: Repl.it Teams for Education是一个实时协作的编码环境，教师和学生可以用50多种语言编写代码。教师可以创建课程，促进配对编码组，提供即时代码反馈与注释和签名。
localize.tagline: 为教师和学生提供零设置的协作式云IDE

localize.description: Repl.it Teams for Education是一個實時協作的編碼環境，教師和學生可以用50多種語言編寫代碼。教師可以創建課程，促進配對編碼組，提供即時代碼反饋與註釋和簽名。
localize.tagline: 爲教師和學生提供零設置的協作式雲IDE

next.title: President Biden will announce later Tuesday that Merck & Co. will help make Johnson & Johnson's one-shot COVID-19 vaccine in an unusual agreement between two competitors that could lead to a significant boost in supply, the Washington Post reported. $JNJ https://t.co/avxTv8aJLI https://t.co/2dAorcqFix

localize.full_text: 据华盛顿邮报报道，总统拜登将在周二晚些时候宣布，默克公司将帮助生产强生公司的一针COVID-19疫苗，这是两个竞争对手之间的一项不同寻常的协议，可能会导致供应量大幅增加。$JNJ https://t.co/avxTv8aJLI https://t.co/2dAorcqFix
據華盛頓郵報報道，總統拜登將在週二晚些時候宣佈，默克公司將幫助生產強生公司的一針COVID-19疫苗，這是兩個競爭對手之間的一項不同尋常的協議，可能會導致供應量大幅增加。$JNJ https://t.co/avxTv8aJLI https://t.co/2dAorcqFix
